author:
Compiled by Tony Hicks

thicks@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: Will Smith making music again
text:
Will Smith making music again Compiled by Tony Hicks Posted: 10/02/2015 01:16:48 PM PDT Updated: 10/02/2015 01:17:40 PM PDT Will Smith has recorded music for the first time in more than a decade. 
The "Suicide Squad" actor performed on a remix of Bomba Estereo's "Fiesta," rapping in both English and Spanish. 
The track was released Friday, according to Entertainment Weekly. 
"When I was told that Will Smith wanted to collaborate on a remix with Bomba, I couldn't believe it," said Simon Mejia, who founded the Columbian band. "This opportunity to work with Will was beyond anything we have dreamed of. It's just magic." 
"Fiesta" (the non-remixed version) was nominated for record of the year at this year's Latin Grammys, which take place Nov. 19. In this Sept. 17, 2015 photo, members of Bomba Estereo pose for a selfie with Will Smith. (Alan Silfen/Sony via AP) Tony Hicks writes celebrity commentary for the Bay Area News Group. Contact him at Facebook.com/BayAreaNewsGroup.TonyHicks or Twitter.com/tonyhicks67 Advertisement
